about_the_game:
Jack into CYBERBUSSY 2069’s slick streets😈🔥 — where the future gleams neon, the nights are endless, and cyber-hunks prowl the streets, aching to be yours. These hot-blooded, augmented studs are hungry, packing all the extra equipment you’ll ever need for an intense, throbbing night of intrigue, pleasure, and sin. 💦🌌

🧩 Erotic Puzzle Gameplay

Prepare to have your skills—and limits—tested with three delicious puzzle modes: Swapping, Rotating, and the wicked Swapping & Rotating combo 😈💦. Every twist, every turn, every move pulls you closer to the reveal of these cyber-hunks in all their glory. Feel the tension as you slide each piece into place, knowing that, with one last shift, you'll expose the raw, unabashed studs just begging to be uncovered.

🔥 Meet the Cyber-Hunks

Meet the ultimate lineup of augmented bad boys and sleek, chrome-plated seducers, each with their own edge that’ll make you bite your lip and lean in close. From bulked-up street kings to sleek, deadly assassins, every cyber-stud brings his own brand of heat that will leave you breathless and begging for more 🥵🔥💪. With 50+ unique cyber-hunks, your fantasies are only just beginning.

🖼️ Gallery & Favorites System

Immerse yourself in the gallery, where each cyber-hunk is captured in high-resolution, every muscle, every smirk teasing you to linger. Effortlessly control the entire gallery using only one hand ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) – whether your left or right-handed, your pleasure is just a finger away! Can’t stop thinking about that one hunk who makes your heart race? Bookmark him and revel in the personalized collection of your favorites, available anytime you’re ready to lose yourself in pure cyber-pleasure 👀💋

🕶️ Intimate Character Profiles

Get up close and personal through full, no-holds-barred profiles that lay out every dirty little detail—from age, measurements, height, weight, kinks, skills, identity, fantasy, dirty talk and more! Whether he’s dominant, rough, or sweet but deadly, each cyber-stud is laid bare, eager to show off and reveal his most secret desires 💬✨. You won’t just want to get to know them—you’ll want to do much more.

🎶 Pulsating Beats and Player Controls

Immerse yourself in the electrifying ambiance with 15+ tracks of immersive, provocative music that set the mood for every intimate encounter in this neon-lit world. The draggable music player puts you in control—adjust the playlist anytime to match the rhythm of your wild CYBERBUSSY adventures. 🎼🎧🔥

🖥️ Technical Features

Experience maximum immersion with full Ultrawide and super ultrawide support, ensuring you catch every cybernetic detail. 📏💻

♿ Accessibility Options

Shape your experience to suit your needs! Switch between background animations—animated, static, or turn it off entirely. Customize text colors and choose from multiple dyslexia-friendly and easy-to-read fonts to make every moment enjoyable. For privacy, use Quick Quit and Quick Minimize options at any time, plus a customizable window name to keep things discreet 🕹️🔒

Enter now, and let these hot-blooded cyber-hunks show you exactly why the future never looked so damn good. Are you ready to master the bussy?

All characters depicted are adults (21+)

content_descriptors.notes: Bussy Master: Cyberbussy features graphic sexual content, including nudity, sexual acts, genitalia, masturbation, bodily fluids, and BDSM themes. All characters are adults (21+).

detailed_description:
KMS Engine v2 Update

🔧 KMS Engine v2 Features: Elevate Your Experience

KMS Engine v2 is packed with updates designed to enhance every aspect of gameplay, accessibility, and customization, delivering a seamless experience from start to finish. Here’s what this update brings:

🎮 Enhanced Gameplay Mechanics
Challenge yourself with three unique puzzle types: Swapping, Rotating, and the all-new Swapping & Rotating combo puzzle. The third puzzle type combines both mechanics, adding a fresh layer of difficulty for those seeking extra challenge. All puzzle types come with newly animated visuals for smoother interaction, and moving between images or puzzle packs is now faster and easier. Plus, a new autocomplete button is available for when you need a little extra help to finish any puzzle.

📝 Instant Feedback Form
Share feedback directly within the game. Whether it’s gameplay thoughts, visuals, bugs, or feature suggestions, the feedback form is there for your insights and ideas.

🌍 Global Localization
With support for 77 languages, this update ensures accessibility worldwide. While all languages except English are Google Translated, this feature expands the game’s reach, making it easier for players everywhere to engage with the content.

🎶 Customizable Music Playlist
Set your perfect background with the new customizable playlist feature, letting you control the soundtrack to match your preferred atmosphere.

🚀 Performance Monitoring
Keep track of your system’s performance while playing, with in-game monitoring that displays FPS, RAM usage, and more. The update offers both basic and advanced monitoring options, helping you stay informed about your system’s activity while in-game.

♿ Advanced Accessibility Options
KMS Engine v2 includes expanded accessibility features to create a more adaptable experience. Choose from various background animation styles, adjust text color, and select from dyslexia-friendly and readability-enhancing fonts. The customizable Escape Key Functionality offers Quick Quit or Quick Minimize options, and you can rename the game window for added privacy.

🚧 Future-Ready
This update is designed to support additional content and features, with further updates planned to bring ongoing enhancements and improvements over time.

name: Bussy Master: CYBERBUSSY 2069

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required if you like sweet tunes
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In CYBERBUSSY 2069, dive into a futuristic underworld teeming with cyber-enhanced hunks ready to fulfill your darkest cravings. Tackle intense, erotic puzzles, unlock steamy characters, and build your futuristic gallery. Neon nights, augmented bodies, and endless pleasure await. Are you ready?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Croatian, Estonian, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, Kannada, Kazakh, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Telugu, Urdu, Uzbek, Welsh, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
